dialogue.raw_text: E by Akiva Goldsman CHAPTER 1: Earth 2058 --------------------- FADE IN ON: EXT.-SPACE PULL BACK slowly as MARS fills THE FRAME, a sphere of red desert and fast rushing crimson clouds. A triangular CARGO SHIP descends from the dark of space.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Mars mining base, this is Grissom One, Request final descent vector. REVERSE ANGLE EXT.-MARS A row of giant red mountains and beneath, on the planet's surface, the spires of A MINING BASE. Illuminated landing crosshairs alight a landing pad, beckoning the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roger, Grissom One, this is Mars Mining, You are cleared to land. Hope you got some Partagas in that rust bucket, Sal. EXT.-EDGE OF SPACE THE CARGO SHIP changes attitude, landing thrusters FIRING as the vessel begins to penetrate the atmosphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I brought you the most amazing... Amazing, what, we'll never know. The CARGO SHIP begins to EXPLODE, the bubble bridge BLOWING out into space in a ball of fire. EXT.- MARS LOW ANGLE from the planet's surface-. Two shapes BLAST through FRAME, BUBBLE FIGHTERS, single pilot, transparent globes, racing up towards the sudden star of the cargo ship at impossible speed. INT.-BUBBLE FIGHTER POV of the burning Cargo Ship, coming towards us incredibly fast. Speed, trajectory and tactical readouts flash. EXT.-CARGO SHIP The pulse lasers are still hammering the ravaged hull. WIDER Two sinister ATTACK SHIPS, their lasers locked onto the Cargo Ship, FIRE away as they BLAST overhead. The nuclear core of the Cargo Ship overloads, the craft finally EXPLODING in a storm of fire. A BUBBLE FIGHTER ROARS through the hurling world of flame. PUSH IN. INT.-BUBBLE FIGHTER A lone FIGURE stands in a gyroscopic harness, working a heads-up holographic display, command controls spinning 360 degrees with the pilot's Comas the fighter SCREAMS after the fleeing raider. The harness spins, the pilot coming clearly into view. Handsome, intense, reckless eyes. MAJOR DON WEST.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sino-Jordanian Raiders. They're claiming the cargo ship violated their air-space. INT.-SECOND BUBBLE FIGHTER Another pilot (JEB WALKER) commands an identical craft, ROCKETING towards the assault craft just below West's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This cold war's heating up. Where did they come from? INT.-WEST'S BUBBLE FIGHTER WEST Hell. And we're going to send them back screaming. West activates his targeting computer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Last one to kill a bad guy buys the beer. TARGETING DISPLAY-CLOSE. The fleeing Attack Ship jogs in and out of the crosshairs on West's holographic array. West fires. EXT.-SPACE The Attack Ship SHOOTS straight up, dodging West's laser BLASTS. INT.-WEST'S BUBBLE FIGHTER West closes on the fleeing craft, as Jeb engages the other Attack Ship, lasers FIRING in the b.g., visible through the transparent surface of the bubble glass under West's feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that sound? must be the fat lady warming up. EXT.-SPACE The fleeing Attack Ship loops in mid-space, reversing direction, heading straight towards West's Bubble Fighter. A game of chicken. INT.-WEST'S BUBBLE FIGHTER West doesn't flinch. Bears down, FIRING madly, the two space ships heading straight for each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right. Come on, come on, you wanna play, I wanna play. EXT.-SPACE The two ships are ROCKETING towards each other, locked in collision vectors, lasers FIRING wildly.              asdasd INT.-WEST'S FIGHTER WEST I can hear her. Oh, yes, oh yes. She's gonna sing. TARGETING:DISPLAY-CLOSE. The Attack Ship flashes, captured in the targeting hatchmarks. The display expands into a tactical grid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Target lock. EXT.-SPACE Imminent collision. INT.-WEST'S FIGHTER The hull of the Attack Ship fills his bubble glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lights are dimming. The curtain's coming down. Sing you fat, old bag, sing! West hits the firing stud. EXT.-DEEP SPACE West's pulse lasers converge on the Attack Ship barely meters ahead, the ROARING craft EXPLODING directly before him. INT.-WEST'S BUBBLE FIGHTER (OVER) WEST SCREAMS as he shoots through the sudden conflagration of flame and debris, everywhere and then gone, giving way to the blackness of space and the starfield beyond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show's over. Below, the second Attack Ship ROARS past, lasers FIRING, locked in a pinwheel battle with Jeb's Bubble Fighter. EXT.-SPACE JEB'S BUBBLE FIGHTER banks, avoiding the high energy volley. Almost. A laser BURST grazes his Bubble Fighter, the surface of his craft sparking, suddenly scored with flames. INT.-JEB'S CRAFT The Attack ship is right behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weapons are off line. Jettisoning main drive core. EXT.-SPACE The thruster core of Jeb's Bubble Fighter BLOWS off in a bolus of flame, soaring back into the pursuit craft. The Raider EXPLODES. INT.-JEB'S CRAFT Controls are sparking. Displays flicker. (OVER) An ALARM sounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warning. Failure in redundant drive systems. JEB-POV. The surface of Mars is rushing up fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impact on in 90 seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mars Control. . . EXT.-SPACE Jeb's ship is barreling toward the planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . . .this is Ranger One. INT.-WEST'S FIGHTER JEB (ON RADIO) ...Engines will not respond. Require assistance. Repeat...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ranger One this is Grissom Base. Rescue craft have been dispatched. EXT.- MARS MINING COLONY Three small rescue craft race skyward. INT.-JEB'S CRAFT COMPUTER Impact in 60 seconds. Mars fills the view screen. INT.-WEST'S CRAFT The rescue craft are speeding toward Jeb's fighter below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grissom, this is Eagle One. Those Pugs Will never reach him in time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eagle one clear this frequency and return to base. DON takes a beat. Then he spins his chair towards Mars, begins working the controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Eagle One. I'm going after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Negative Eagle one, your craft is not equipped West hits his thrusters. EXT.-SPACE West's craft dives toward Jeb's ship and Mars below. INT.-JEB'S FIGHTER Mars is coming up fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impact in 30 seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jeb, do you have navigational thrusters?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a yes or no question. Mars fills the windscreen. Jeb checks his status display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marginal. But in the green.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impact in 15 seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Head towards the canals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saving your ass. Read towards the canals. Now! The canal streaked face of the Mars is all Jeb can see. He grabs his throttle, engages his navigational thrusters and pulls. EXT.-JEB'S SHIP A tiny directional thruster FIRES, angling Jeb's craft so that it scrapes the surface of Mars and dives into a giant canal, rocky walls rushing up fast. INT.-WEST'S SHIP West is accelerating toward Jeb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Major West, your ship is not equipped for rescue. You are not authorized to jeopardize this asset. That is a direct order. Acknowledge! West slams a switch, deactivating his radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never liked that station, anyway. He BLASTS into the canal, walls rushing up on either side of him. EXT.-MARTIAN CANAL Jeb's tiny craft is plunging toward the rocky crater floor below. Overhead West's fighter appears, under full thrusters, roaring towards the crater floor faster and at a sharper angle. INT.-3EB'S FIGHTER The canal floor is rushing up fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impact in five seconds. INT.-WEST'S FIGHTER Don is blasting toward the canal floor, almost as if trying to beat Jeb's ship to a fiery impact below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warning. Proximity alert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jeb, I'm going to give you a little kiss. Don't take it the wrong way. EXT.-MARTIAN CANAL West angles his ship directly under Jeb. INT.-JEB'S FIGHTER The expanding surface of Mars, visible beneath his feet, is suddenly obscured by Don's fighter, swooping under his ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don, abort. Abort. INT.-WEST'S FIGHTER Jeb's fighter is visible overhead. West going up. Don angles the throttle. EXT.-MARTIAN CANAL Don's ship, sandwiched between the surface of Mars and Jeb's fighter, angles up and, like a cue ball hitting it's target, Knocks Jeb's ship spinning toward the safety of space beyond. West's ship actually scrapes the surface of the planet, sending up a plume of Martian dust. INT.-WEST'S FIGHTER JEB (OVER) Does this mean we're going steady? West pulls his throttle all the way back. EXT.-MARTIAN CANAL West shoots up and out towards the dark of space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You weren't getting out of buying those beers that easy. The rescue craft converge on Jeb's ship as Don heads for base.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : CHAPTER 2: Mission Objectives ----------------------------- IMAGES-CLOSE. A Sallow field. (OVER) a heroic, stringy anthem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Imagine an end to world hunger. What if ample food and clean drinking water were the birthright of all our planet's children? INSERT IMAGE-A dashing hero, wind in his hair. JOHN ROBINSON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This man, professor John Robinson, inventor of the faster than light hyperdrive can make that timeless dream a reality. INSERT IMAGES -Airbrushed faces of a perfect family. THE ROBINSONS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John Robinson and his family have been extensively trained to take a ten year journey across the galaxy in the world's most advanced spacecraft, The Jupiter. INSERT IMAGE-A towering launch dome glints in the morning sun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From a distant world, the Robinsons, Will bring back a miracle... INSERT IMAGE-A satellite photo of a planet. Closer on continental patches, enhanced to show deposits of a diamond like powder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dimondium can turn even worthless sand to fertile soil. Earth WILL be a garden. What kind of - future can our children look forward to? INSERT IMAGES - Sun dappled, swaying wheat. (OVER) Music crescendos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A future without hunger. A future without suffering. Heaven on Earth. INSERT CORPORATE LOGO.-A Coke bottle hurling towards the stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This mission sponsored by the US Army and the Coca-Cola corporation. PULL BACK TO REVEAL WILL ROBINSON (10) hides in a small space, watching the commercial on a jury-rigged, palm-sized computer. He mimics the Naylrator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coke. Saving the world for our children. (a beat) Give me a hi-test break. WILL-POV. Spying through the open slats of his biding place into... INT:-LIVING ROOM-AFTERNOON Basic twenty first century modern. MAUREEN ROBINSON stands, talking with a PRINCIPAL who in less than happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He hacked our main power grid to run his experiment. The school was in chaos. We didn't even have lights. The room lights suddenly dim. The Principal flickers, revealed as a holograph, her head now sitting on Schwartzenegger body. Maureen LAUGHS, then realizes the Principal has no idea her image is being distorted. Maureen begins moving about the room, surreptitiously glancing behind couches, into cabinets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is no laughing matter, Mrs. Robinson. Will is terribly gifted. His little time machines, though pure fancy, are the products of a truly brilliant mind. The Principal's body has become Twiggy's. Now that of an ape. Maureen pulls open a closet. Will sits inside. Grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The changing shape of education.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No more monkey business. Will shrugs, adjusts his deck. The Principal returns to normal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The boy is starved for attention. Was there no way his father could have attended the science fair? EXT.-HOUSTON - DAY Probably Austin and Dallas too. Texas has become a giant urban sprawl spreading into Mexico and beyond. Immense industrial air purifiers hang in a dark, wet sky. EXT.-HOUSTON SPACE COMMAND-ESTABLISHING A giant dome topped pedestal towers ever the skyline. INT.-SPACE COMMAND-MISSION CONTROL-DAY A MAN stands before a large viewscreen facing the throng of PRESS. He's a little uncomfortable with all the media attention. This is PROFESSOR JOHN ROBINSON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once we have landed on Alpha Prime our on board robot will begin construction of a hypergate. ON SCREEN a hi-tech orbital gate is highlighted and expanded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By then, technicians here on Earth will have completed a companion hypergate in our planet's orbit. ON SCREEN an image of an orbital gate now under construction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once both gates are complete, ships will be able to pass instantaneously between them. The Jupiter can bring the Dimondium back to Earth without the ten year delay of a return trip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why can't you just use the Jupiter's hyperengine to zap straight to Alpha Prime?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As you know, hyperspace exists beneath normal space. If you try to enter hyperspace without a gate ON SCREEN a graphic spaceship appears randomly in the corner of a turning schematic of the galaxy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your exit vector is random. There's no telling where you'd come out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Professor, how is Captain Daniels recovering from the flu? Will we still be able to pilot the mission? John glances to the doorway where a uniformed GENERAL stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ladies and Gentlemen, you came to get a look at the Jupiter One. Don't you think you've waited long enough? John hits a button and the room darkens. A giant monitor reveals... INT.-LAUNCH DOME A giant saucer sits connected to its launch pad by loading belts, steaming fuel tubes and spindled gantries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Professor, how does your family feel about leaving the Earth behind....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They couldn't be more excited. CHAPTER 3: Goodbye! ------------------- EXT.-ROBINSON HOUSE-ESTABLISHING A suburban colonial, the launch dome towering in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This whole mission sucks! INT.-ROBINSON HOME HALLWAY-SUNSET PENNY ROBINSON (14) furious, turns, looks downstairs at Maureen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't want to stay home for dinner. I want to see my friends for the last time. She takes a beat, blinking away the tears. Lifts her wrist and turns on a video camera watch. She begins down the hall. VIDEO-POV. Penny's face in the monitor screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... On the eve before she is torn from her friends, kidnapped, hurled into deep space against her will, what thoughts fill the mind of the young Space Captive.... INT.-WILL'S ROOM-SUNSET Penny enters a strewn, boy' a world. Will is trying to select items to place in a single packing canister marked: PERSONAL CARGO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will there be boys on Alpha Centuri? What will I wear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When we wake up in ten years the video journals of Penny Robinson, Space Captive, will be devoured by millions. I will be world famous. You on the other hand, will have been totally forgotten. Penny shows the camera her arm, covered by strings of ribbons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Space Captive has decided to wear ribbons of support for fellow sufferers as she is dragged into deep space, green for the ecological issues, white for human rights
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'd probably gag if I described the secondary infections loss of circulation can cause. Penny seems about to speak, instead just smiles, goes to his bed and pulls off the sheets, begins knotting them together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you grinning at?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just found an upside to this mission. The thought of jettisoning your body into deep space. Penny knots the sheets into a rope, ties it to the bed-post. Will lifts several palm-sized gold-plated stars. Each reads: 1st prize.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad says Don't bring them. Like anything I do matters to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He never showed, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe if I had actually broken the time barrier he would have paid attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't let him get to you, kiddo. He just gets busy with work is all. Penny tosses the rope out the window, prepares to climb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, that's a no to family dinner?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's see, do I spend my last night on Earth watching Mom and Dad pretend not to be fighting again or get in ten years of making-out at the mall ... you do the math.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom's gonna go thermal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's she gonna do. Ground me? CHAPTER 4: Major West --------------------- INT.-SPACE COMMAND-CORRIDOR John and the General walk the metal passageway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're lucky they didn't press on Daniels, condition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I figured a chance to look at the ship would keep the dogs at bay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben, I'm worried about jamming in a replacement pilot at the last second. My family' a on this mission. I need someone who's more than just spit and polish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got your man. He just doesn't know it yet. The General palms an access panel. A door hisses open to reveal... INT.-SPACE COMMAND- CONFERENCE ROOM-CONTINUOUS A figure stands staring silently out the window. Don West. He offers a salute. By his eyes, West is clearly agitated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At ease, Major.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, why was I pulled off active duty? I salvaged my craft and Jeb's. I'll fight a court martial, General.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know Professor Robinson?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By reputation only. (to John) Your father's battle strategies were required reading at the Academy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much do you know about the Jupiter Mission, Major?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Jupiter is fully automated. The pilot flies the ship out of the solar system and lands on Alpha Prime. It's a baby sitting job, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Major, you are aware Earth's resources are severely limited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every schoolchild knows our recycling technologies will save the environment. Sending a family across the galaxy is a publicity stunt to sell soda to people of all ages.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I am about to tell you is classified. Every schoolchild has been lied to. The recycling technologies have failed. In less than two decades Earth will be unable to support human life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We spun the ad campaign to give the mission a friendly face, keep people from panicking in the streets. We partnered with Coke because the 900 billion this mission cost would have bankrupted the government. The SinoJordanian Alliance knows the truth as well as we do. They hope to reach Alpha Prime first - And if they do, I guarantee you, they will not share the Dimondium with Western Demons like us. our crops will wither. We will be left to die.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Captain Daniels doesn't have the flu, does he sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daniels was murdered in his apartment last night. The flu story is a cover we fed the press.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dan was a good pilot. A good man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your rescue stunt over Mars was foolhardy. Explain yourself, Major.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had a friend in trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You endangered a one billion dollar spacecraft, disobeyed a direct order because of a friend?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes sir. And I'd do it again. Sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll do. (stepping forward)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Congratulations Major, you're the new pilot of the Jupiter mission. CHAPTER 5: Dr. Smith -------------------- EXT.-DESERT-DAY Sun beats hard on a MAN who stands on a windswept sand dune, talking to a smartly dressed BUSINESSMAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps a brief jaunt down memory lane is required. I was contracted to provide Daniels, apartment code. My work is done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They found a replacement pilot, the mission is going ahead on schedule.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How tragic. For you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We require more direct intervention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see. Well, that will cost you. And, I'm afraid my price has just become ... astronomical. (OVER) a KNOCK. The man reaches forward and presses a button. The businessman, the desert disappear, only holographs. Room lights. Lights come up to reveal... INT.-MISSION CONTROL-MEDICAL LABS The man turns, revealing a face as clever an his eyes are evil. This is DR. ZACHARY SMITH. He walks to the door, palms a panel, and the portal hiss open. A TECHNICIAN ENTERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Control hasn't received the results of your final pre-flight exams, Doctor Smith. The Doctor moves to a circular overhead light board around which are displayed the faces of the crew of the Jupiter craft. Removes the micro-files, hands them to the technician.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Robinsons are checked out at one hundred percent. They are in perfect condition and ready to fly. He smiles, so sweet you can barely see the malevolence behind it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wish them good luck for me. CHAPTER 6: Welcome Aboard! -------------------------- INT.-SPACE COMMAND-WALKING Three small figures walk through a gantry towards the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mission protocols are simple. Professor Robinson is in command unless you encounter a military emergency. In that case, Major West, you will assume command. The figures have come to the saucer entry-port.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome aboard, Major. INT.-JUPITER BRIDGE - CONTINUOUS Don, John, and the General ENTER. Don's eyes widen. West looks like somebody sprung for the full extras package on this baby. REVERSE ANGLE Hi-tech heaven. Two pilots, chairs face a giant windscreen. Don walks to the consoles that stretch toward the back walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some of this technology might be new to you. I'll be happy to explain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off the com) Cold fusion drive (off the size consoles) Rambler-Krey Life Sciences stations. Don strides to a pedestal in the center of the bridge. Flicks a switch and a holographic Jupiter craft appears on the launch pad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holographic navigational interface. Don points to a row of man-sized glass cylinders on the back wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cryosleep array. Fully monitored. He approaches the blast doors that lead off the back of the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sick bay, remote Ops, engineering and living quarters are below decks. Hyperengine should be in here. Don hits a wall panel which opens to reveal an immense ENGINE ROOM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you have to baby sit, it's not such a bad nursery, wouldn't you agree, Major? Just then the ELEVATOR rises from the lower decks. On its circular platform stands a DOCTOR in a lab coat. She walks to the General.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cryosleep systems are running at ninety five percent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doctor Smith approved the specs-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doctor Smith is base physician. I am responsible once this ship is in flight. These tubes have to keep the crew in suspended animation for ten years. They will be perfect or this ship will not launch. Is that clear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely, Doctor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Judy, I'd like you to meet Major West. He's taking Mike's place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's heavier than Mike. We'll have to re-calibrate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd be more than happy to discuss my dimensions perhaps over dinner?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: West - I've read about you. Something of a war hero, aren't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (preening ) Well, yes, actually.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those who can't think, fight. (a freezing smile) Well, nice to have met you. She heads toward the readouts. West turns to John.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's one cold fish I'd love to thaw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (turning) I'm not going to make it home for dinner, Dad. West turns to John. Dad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's going to be a long flight. EXT.-ROBINSON HOME-NIGHT Lights burn in the windows. INT.-ROBINSON HOME-DINING ROOM-NIGHT John ENTERS to find the remains of an elegant dinner on the table, candles never lit, food never eaten. John crosses to a small scale model sitting on the table. Around it hangs another gold plated 1st prize star. He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He won first prize again. He practically brought down his entire school. But he won first prize. Maureen descends the steps in a bathrobe. Joins John.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A non-working prototype for his time machine. Sharp stuff for a midget. Maureen is silent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry about dinner. I had to work late. The new pilot-.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you had to do was prioritize your family over the mission
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maureen. This mission is about our family. So we can stay together
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The perfect nuclear family. The most stable social unit, ideally suited for the isolation of a long journey into space. It's all just PR, John. You're never home. Judy is becoming a ghost just like you. Penny can't see past her own navel and Will has to black out-his school, just to get his father's attention. The perfect nuclear family in ruin. John stares at his wife. Then he reaches forward, touches her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, Maureen. I'm scared too. A beat. Then she moves to him. And he holds her close. INT.-ROBINSON HOME-WILL'S ROOM-NIGHT John stands in the yellow wedge of hall light. He touches something hanging around his own neck. A pair of metal dog tags. WIDER Will lies in his bed, eyes closed. Asleep. A beat. John turns, heading out into the hall. EXT.-ROBINSON HOME-NIGHT The bedroom lights go out, a normal home against the backdrop of the launch dome towering in the distance. INT.-SPACE COMMAND-LAUNCH DOME-NIGHT The Jupiter one stands amidst loading gantries, final supplies rolling into the ship on automated conveyer belts and lifts. CHAPTER 7: Primary Directives ----------------------------- PAN DOWN TWO TECHNICIANS stand checking off supplies on a lightpad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything else?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm showing a late shipment from Mission Medical. Smith's authorization. Here it is now. HOLD on a canister that reads: BIOLOGICAL MATERIALS: Do Not Open, as it passes on the loading belt. FOLLOW THE DRUM as it winds along the conveyer, up a gantry towards the Jupiter One. PUSH IN... INT. -CARGO DRUM Smith sits crouched inside, cleaning his nails. INT.-JUPITER ONE-LOWER DECKS A giant robot stands attached to its service bay. Still. Silent. A SERVICE DRAWER slides open and a shadowy infiltrator emerges, his face visible in the dim service light. Smith. Smith approaches the docked Robot, places a small keypad device on the Robot's dormant CPU panel. Smith activates the device.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll forgive me if I forgo the kiss, my sleeping behemoth. Smith hits a switch on the panel and the Robot's system indicators light into life. Smith types several keys on the keypad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the time has come to awake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robot is on-line. Reviewing primary directives. One, preserve the Robinson Family. Two, Maintain ship systems. Three
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spare me the chatter. Smith taps the keypad. The Robot is silenced. Smith types again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What noble charges my steely centurion. Sadly I fear you have far more dire deeds in store for you. Smith completes his re-programming. Hits a switch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robot is on-line. Reviewing primary directives. Two hours into mission destroy Robinson family. Destroy all systems. Smith smiles. Removes the re-programming module.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now that's more like it. Farewell my tin-plated pal. Give my regards to oblivion. Smith climbs into a chute marked WASTE DISPOSAL. INT.-WASTE DISPOSAL CHUTE Smith begins crawling down the chute. His tiny reprogramming module BEEPS. Smith activates a tiny, built in com-link. From the mic, the familiar visage of the Businessman is projected into the crawlspace over Smith's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you never to call me here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see you have completed your mission on schedule Good work, Doctor. And goodbye. The Businessman smiles. SMITH-CLOSE. Puzzled. Suddenly the tiny module in his hand OVERLOADS, the flesh on his palm smoking as Smith is engulfed in an electrical charge. He goes out, his body perfectly still. CHAPTER 8: Launch! ------------------ EXT.-SPACE COMMAND-MORNING The giant dome shines in the early sun. INT-JUPITER ONE  John and Maureen face will and Penny who stand now in their freezing tubes. All  wear silver flight suits. Maureen moves Penny's hair from in front of her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't, mom. Vogue says this will be the style in ten years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will she wake up less annoying?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does he have to wake up at all?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright you two, enough. Maureen kisses her children. John moves to will who reaches to shake at the same moment John tries to hug him. A beat. Then John tries to a shake as Will goes for the hug. A total miss. Will backs into his tube.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You get a C in paternal expression, Professor. But an A for effort. John kisses his wife, already in her tube.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You always get an A in that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't let me shatter this unbridled display of affection, but we are running behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (entering his tube) Major, she's all yours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll try to give you a smooth ride. Judy walks the row, checking their bio-monitors. Enters her tube.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mission control this is Dr. Robinson. We are in the green.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roger, Doctor, you are go to initiate cryostasis. Don walks to Judy's tube.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One question, Doctor. in there room in these tubes for two?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Barely enough for you and your ego, Major. Drive carefully. (touches her com-link) initializing cryostasis tubes. The tubes rotate closed around the Robinsons. Suddenly each crew member is surrounded by a shimmering blue glow, brightening like a star and then subsiding. All stand fixed in suspended animation. Don stares at the family a beat. He goes to the main console. Straps himself in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mission Control, this is Jupiter One. The Robinsons are asleep. We are ready to fly. INT.-SPACE COMMAND-MISSION CONTROL Welcome to the future. Banks of monitors manned by gum-chewing, pink haired technicians. A giant monitor shows the Jupiter on the launch pad. The CONTROLLER (NOAH FREEMAN) pulls in to his console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jupiter Two this is Mission Control. You are at T-minus two minutes and counting. We're opening the dome. MONITOR-CLOSE. The dome begins to part. EXT.-JUPITER ONE Giant gantries retract. Fueling lines disengage. INT.-JUPITER ONE WEST External fuel pressure to zero. Powering main drive systems. EXT.-JUPITER ONE The nuclear drive at the base of the saucer EXPLODES, the giant craft TREMBLING, straining towards the sky. INT.-MiSSION CONTROL NOAH Jupiter One you are at ninety five percent. INT.-JUPITER ONE WEST Houston, main drive systems to on line status. It's showtime. EXT.-JUPITER ONE Nuclear ENGINES ROAR. The ship begins to rise in a bolus of flame. INT.- MISSION CONTROL NOAH We have lift off. INT.-JUPITER ONE WEST Requesting escape trajectory. INT.-MISSION CONTROL NOAH Major, your escape vector in clear of all military and commercial traffic. Op in go on your command. INT.-JUPITER ONE WEST Roger, Houston. West reaches for a glowing panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're outta here. EXT. JUPITER ONE The atomic power source fires a focused BLAST, shooting the Jupiter through cloud and sky towards the black edge of space. INT:-MISSION CONTROL The main screen shows a graphic of the Jupiter's trajectory as the ship arcs toward the outer edge of the atmosphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jupiter One, you are clear Earth's atmosphere. A CHEER goes up in the control room. EXT.-JUPITER ONE The giant saucer shell EXPLODES, revealing the inner ship, the glittering high tech shape of the JUPITER TWO. INT.-JUPITER TWO Don watches as the Earth recedes into a blue marble, flickering orbital billboards growing distant. Smiles at the familiar sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jupiter One booster disengaged. Proceeding towards Mercury. EXT.-JUPITER TWO Nuclear diodes at the ship's base spin into life, glowing with atomic fire, the ship now heading towards Mercury and beyond. INT.-JUPITER TWO-LOWER DECKS The Robot stands dormant in his service bay. HOLD on the closed service drawer in the b.g. PUSH IN. INT.-SERVICE DRAWER Smith lies still, unconscious in the dark compartment. INT-JUPITER TWO BRIDGE Mercury hangs like a red moon in the front viewscreen. WIDER Don presses a button and two giant blast shields close over the Jupiter Two's main viewscreen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Houston, diverting all spacecraft controls to the main computer. (off mic) Eight years of flight training. He walks to the center of the bridge and activates the navigational holograph, images forming in mid-air over the pedestal. HOLOGRAPH- CLOSE. The Jupiter Two is visible, backed by the planets of our solar system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Navigational holographics on line. (off mic) Fifty combat missions. Don touches buttons and a highlight indicates the ship's trajectory past mercury, around the Sun in a slingshot and into space beyond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Course confirmed for slingshot exit of the solar system. (off mic) Just so I can take the family camper on an interstellar picnic. Don walks to the freezing tubes. He zips up his silver flight suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten world series. My, nephews' high school and college graduations. A decade's worth of Sports Illustrated swimsuit editions. (a beat) Noah, ten years in a lifetime. West climbs into his tube. INT.-MISSION CONTROL NOAH Sleep well, old friend. INT.-JUPITER TWO Don hits a switch and his tube closes. A beat then he is engulfed by the blue glow, frozen in space. The tubes rise into the craft. EXT.-JUPITER TWO The ship flies on into the endless night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : CHAPTER 9: Destroy! ------------------- INT.-JUPITER TWO-WASTE DISPOSAL CHUTE-LATER Smith lies still. He starts from a nightmare into...-a nightmare INT.-JUPITER TWO-LOWER DECKS Smith scrambles out of the chute, stares at his hand, the impression of the overloaded communicator seared into his palm. He spins around disoriented. Stumbles to a closed view screen and hits a stud. The blast shield opens. Space. SMITH-CLOSE. Shock. No words. THE ROBOT-CLOSE. In his docking bay. Suddenly the automaton powers up, lights activating as his CPU comes on line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Smith turns, slaps the burned out programming module on the Robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disable program. No response. The Robot continues to power up. Smith engage interface. Initiate system shut-down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robot is on line. Implementing prime command directives. The Robot disengages from the service bay, begins rolling forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robinson family, destroy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Cease. Desist. The Robot rolls towards the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All operating Systems, destroy. Smith grabs a wrench from a tool bracket, leaps for the Robot. The Robot swings once, sending Smith flying into a flaring console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jupiter Two, destroy. INT.-MISSION CONTROL-NIGHT Dark. A single Techie (ANNIE) mans the watch, playing holo-games with a stylus over her desk. SCREENS flicker into life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the-? (into a mic) Somebody wake up the chief. INT.-JUPITER TWO-BRIDGE Still. The bridge doors open and the ambient lights come on. The Robot rolls onto the bridge, faces the cryosleep array. He extends his arms, an electrical charge arcing between his claws.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robinson Family, destroy. He fires, a blast of electricity hitting the cryosleep controls. (OVER) ALARMS sound as the tubes begin to descend, electricity sparking across the sleeping Robinsons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mechanical moron. You'll kill us all. Smith, wrench in hand, rushes the Robot, is again hurled across the room. The Robot turns towards the navigational computer. INT.-MISSION CONTROL Fully lit. All the monitors are manned by sleepy Techies. Noah ENTERS, taking a coffee from Annie without breaking stride. , ALARMS flash everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This mission's over. Wake them up. The Techies begins working the controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No response, sir. I'm sorry. INT.-JUPITER TWO The Robot is facing the navigational holograph in the center of the bridge. The electricity arcs between his claws once again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Operating systems, Destroy. Smith is slumped against the bulkhead. He shakes off his fall in time to see the Robot fire at the navigational array, the holograph disappearing in the flames of the exploding pedestal. EXT.-JUPITER TWO The ship begins to veer off course, falling towards the sun. INT.JUPITER TWO The Robot is rolling toward the com. THE FREEZING TUBES are quickly being engulfed in flames. Smith stumbles toward their control station. Begins typing madly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wake up, damn you. I can't stop this infernal contraption on my own. He SMASHES a glass panel that reads EMERGENCY DEACTIVATE. The figures inside the lowering tubes glow. All except Judy. The Robot is before the Com, electricity arcing between his claws.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off the tubes) Hurry up. Hurry up. The Robot FIRES at the main Com, controls EXPLODING everywhere. The freezing tubes begin to open, the Robot spinning to face them. John blinks to life first. Emerges, ducking a BLAST of electrical energy from the Robot, hitting the deck and rolling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maureen. The children. Maureen grabs Will and Penny, pulls them down just as the Robot blows away their tubes. John pulls a laser pistol from a wall mount.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Disengage safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Voiceprint confirmed. The Robot spins towards John, FIRES an electrical charge - John dodges at the last instant, the grazing blast burning his silvery suit, singeing his side, sending into the wall, his gun flying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad! Will ducks under his mother's arm, scrambles across the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will, wait. The Robot FIRES at the scrambling boy but misses, Will disappearing down the gunny hatch leading to the lower decks. DON leaps from his tube atop the Robot's back, trying to grab the Robot's power source. The mechanical monster electrifies his shell, sending the Major flying. The Robot turns to Penny and Maureen. Extends his arms toward them. Electricity arcing between his claws. The two are done for. Maureen puts her hand over Penny's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look away, baby. The Robot is about to fire. Suddenly the Robot freezes, his claws deactivate, his power lights go to stand-by and he stands immobile. WIDER. Will stands in the b.g., his tiny hacking deck in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robot. Return to your docking bay and power down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Command accepted. The Robot turns and begins heading for the elevator. All watch in amazement. Will grins, a familiar mischievous gleam in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If the family won't come to the science fair, bring the science fair to the family. An EXPLOSION rocks the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom, look, it's Doctor Smith. Penny stands over Smith who lays crumpled in the corner. Maureen grabs an emergency medi-kit from a wall clamp, tosses it to Penny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pulse, respiration and bleeding-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Basic triage, lock down and stabilize. I know the drill. John is standing, helps Don to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: picnic, no robots. Don moves fast to the helm. The main view screen is still closed, covered by giant metal blast shields.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Communications links are down. Maureen is at the life sciences console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Life support is at ten percent. Trying to bring secondary systems on line. It's not working. VIDEO MONITOR-POV. Penny is bandaging Smith's head, her bravado barely masking her fathoml4ss terror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Explosions rock the ship. Danger is everywhere, 'Yet the Space Captive is fearless as she... A console FLARES. Penny fights back tears, terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to go home now. Don is at the navigational system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rerouting power from the secondary couplings. Try it again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Finding a power tap.... Suddenly the lights go on, the air compressors begin to Hiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Life support is back on line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't get the blast shields open. We're flying blind. Penny in working ever Smith, bandaging his head. She runs stimulator under his nose. Smith begins to stir, COUGHING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got life signs. (wincing) Boy, somebody could use a breath mint. West turns, spots Smith for the first time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to John) Try the emergency back-ups. Don moves to the fallen figure, lifts him up against the bulkhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smith, what the hell-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was making a last minute check ... someone hit me from behind. Don almost buys it. Then he notices Smith's hand, grabs it. BURN-CLOSE. The reprogramming module's distinctive, foreign signature seared into his flesh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sino-Jordanian technology. You're a Goddamned spy. (realizing) You did this. Don slams him against the bulkhead, begins dragging him towards the airlock. The pilot hits a switch. The inner hatch opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop. What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dropping some extra weight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help, somebody. Please. REVERSE ANGLE Maureen stands at Judy's freezing tube. The young doctor's cryofield is sparking on and off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The thawing engine in broken. can't get her out. She's dying. Smith uses the distraction to palm-slam Don in the chin, knocking him backwards. Don staggers, goes again for Smith.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Touch me and the girl dies. Don freezes in his tracks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your mission physician is indisposed. I can save her life. But only if you spare mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't deal with dead men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill me, I kill the girl. How much is your revenge worth, Major? I will, of course, need your word as an officer that you will let me live. Don's decision is lighting fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got a com signal. Suddenly the radio SQUAWKS into life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Is Mission Control. Do you read? Jupiter Two this is
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emergency power's on line. I think I can get these blast shields open. VIEWSCREEN CLOSE. The blast shields part to reveal a giant fiery orb in their path. They are heading directly for the sun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh. INT.-MISSION CONTROL Noah stands over the Com. The room is a madhouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me a telemetry projection. Noah looks up at the main monitor. The graphic of the Jupiter Two is heading towards the graphic of the sun. INT.-JUPITER TWO John and Don stand over the Com.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're way off course. We show you in the sun's gravitational pull.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long do we have?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We count seven minutes before your outer hull begins to melt. DON straps himself into the pilot's chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to try for the Mercury Mines. SMITH stands at the freezing tube, Penny and Maureen assisting him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will need Dr. Robinson's portable gurney. I believe it is stored in-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on it. Penny races off. Smith begins working the controls to Judy's freezing tube.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We trusted you. (sinking in) You tried to kill us all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Existence offers us nothing if not the opportunity for an endless series of betrayals. (off her stunned expression) There's a world behind the world, Professor Robinson. Lie once, cheat twice and everything becomes clear. Do not mistake my deception for a character flaw. It is philosophical choice, a profound understanding of the universe. It is a way of life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a monster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps. But I am also the only one who can save your daughter's life. Penny reappears, a case in hand. She presses a button and the case unfolds into a hovering, gyroscopicaly-leveled gurney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Will?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's futzing with that Robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, Penny dear, I need you to short the power on my command.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does he have to call me dear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Professor, if you will assist me in lowering the body. Smith hands Penny a wrench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Penny, dear. Now. Maureen nods. Penny SLAMS the wrench into the power circuit. The freezing field FLARES and deactivates, the tube swinging open. LIFESIGN MONITOR-CLOSE. Flatline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's dying. Smith and Maureen lower her onto the gurney.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sickbay. Move. Penny, Maureen and Smith rush the gurney out the blast doors towards Sickbay just as the ship tilts madly. AT THE HELM WINDSCREEN-CLOSE. The sun is growing ever larger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unable to re-route to Mercury. The sun's pull is too strong. (a beat) Noah, I need options. INT.-MISSION CONTROL NOAH Major West we are unable to provide contingencies. (a beat) I'm sorry, Don. ON SCREEN-THE JUPITER TWO is heading towards the sun. INT.-JUPITER TWO-SICKBAY Penny, Smith and Maureen have transferred Judy onto a hi-tech scanning-bed. A hovering holographic schematic of Judy's physiognomy appears over her, descends onto her body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Body temp at 68 Fahrenheit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get her flight suit off. Penny unzips the silver material as Smith works the console, highlighting her holographic heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clear. The holographic image of her heart beats once, then is still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Again. Clear. The lights flicker on the bio-console, the holograph winks out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Power's down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're losing her. CHAPTER 10: Initiate Hyperdrive ------------------------------- INT. -JUPITER TWO DON and John man the Com. The sun is a raging fireball dead ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've re-routed all secondary systems to the main drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She won't budge. Shortest baby sitting mission I've ever done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My family's not going die in space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm open to suggestions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Outer hull breach in 30 seconds. INT.-SICKBAY Smith begins pumping Judy's chest by hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, child. Fight. Put a little heart in it. Smith steps back, begins precise, staccato blows to Judy's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The life.. . (hit ) I save ... (hit) may be (hit) my own. Smith stops, presses his ear to her chest - Takes her pulse. Smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Judy? Baby? A beat. Then Judy opens her eyes, manages a weak smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should try to look less worried. It has a tendency to spook the patients.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Smith) Thank you. Smith holds her gaze, his eyes almost snake-like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are a good woman, Maureen. Any man could see that. I hope I have proven the well-being of your family is of great importance to me. Perhaps, if you convinced your husband to trust me... Maureen stares at him. A beat. She pulls a laser from the wall. Points it at his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stabilize her, Smith. Because you only breathe as long as she does. INT.-JUPITER TWO BRIDGE The ship is shaking in the mighty pull of the sun. Don is struggling to keep the ship stable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heat seal breach in 20 seconds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's got to be some way to get through this. DON stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't get away from the sun. So we have to go through it. The hyperdrive -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Engage the hyperdrive without a gate, we could be thrown anywhere in the galaxy
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anywhere but here. INT.-MISSION CONTROL ANNIE We're getting resident radiation distortions from the space craft. She must be breaking up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me see those numbers, Annie. The Techie hands him a sheet. Noah looks for a beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Son of a bitch. He's powering up the hyperdrive. EXT.-JUPITER TWO The saucer is elongating slightly, changing its shape as it prepares to enter hyperspace. INT.-JUPITER TWO BRIDGE Will scrambles onto the bridge, heads towards John who is working the main control panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hyperengines coming on line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warning. Heat shield breach. The sun covers the entire windscreen, a furious landscape of flame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hyperdrive at 100 percent. Major, you have the Com.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zero to 20 million miles a second in under a minute. Let's see what this baby can do. John takes Will's hand as West engages the hyperdrive. West, John and Will, are hurled backwards from the sudden acceleration, sticking to the walls and ceiling respectively. INT.-SICKBAY Maureen and Penny watch as Smith swaddles Judy in thermal blanket. Suddenly, Maureen, Penny, and Smith fly against the walls. Judy is held in place by the gurney straps. INT.-MISSION CONTROL The graphic of the space craft is beginning to flicker as it merges with the graphic of the sun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't keep a fix on her, sir. She's starting to disappear. Noah stares at the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Godspeed. EXT.-SPACE The Jupiter Two flies into the mighty ball of the sun. And just as it reaches the tallest of the gaseous mountains, the ship becomes translucent, falling through the orb, elongating and then vanishing in a sudden star of hyperspace. INT.-JUPITER TWO THE WINDSCREEN. The sky breaks apart giving way to a starfield. EXT.-DEEP SPACE Quiet. Empty. Suddenly space distorts and, in a sudden flash, a ship appears, hurling into the darkness. The Jupiter Two. The Jupiter Two comes to rest at the edge of an alien, twin starred solar system, near a giant crimson planet. CHAPTER 11: Lost in Space ------------------------- INT.-JUPITER TWO-INFIRMARY Maureen kneels before Penny and Will, making sure they're okay. Smith stands silently in the b.g. Judy's gurney is empty. John ENTERS, his face wrought with fatherly concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is everyone okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All in one piece. Although Major West has the most puzzling definition of a smooth ride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Judy? Where's Judy? Just then Judy emerges through a door, zipping up her flight suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boy either I cut down on the coffee or sew in a flap. It's hell getting in and out of this thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vitals are normal. Pulse and respiration seem to be-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby, are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm fine Daddy really. John holds her close, spared a father's worst fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will every disaster be an excuse for familial sentiment? Please tell me now so I may gather up a liberal supply of space sickness bags. Don turns towards Smith. Maureen steps between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened, John? Where are we? INT.-JUPITER TWO-BRIDGE Don in at the navigational holograph, patching sparking wires. The rest of the crew emerge onto the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You had me worried, Doc. Nice to see you thawed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smart maneuver with the hyper-drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A fighter who thinks, what do you know? You're just in time for the show. Don makes a connection. The pedestal powers up, a holograph of the Jupiter Two appearing over its surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Computer, map our current location. HOLOGRAPHIC PEDESTAL-CLOSE. The area around the Jupiter Two is now filled with a holographic representation of the alien solar system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See anything familiar? Don just shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Searching for recognizable constellations. (a beat) Unable to locate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This computer has star maps of the entire known galaxy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're lost, aren't we? Judy wraps her arm around her sister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell is that? VIEWSCREEN- CLOSE. The nearest planet is starting to glow. Suddenly a distortion field begins to emanate from the alien world. The edges of space seem to sear away, leaving a glowing portal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any effect on the ship?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. VIEWSCREEN -CLOSE. All the planets and constellations beyond the portal appear to be in different places.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (off the navigational hologram) All the planets have moved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And where did that come from? CHAPTER 12: The Proteus ----------------------- EXT.-SPACE Breaking the inner edge of the portal, a long silver space needle catches the light from the dual suns. INT.-JUPITER TWO The crew man their stations. Only Will is absent as they the ship maneuver around the portal. VIEWSCREEN -CLOSE. As they, move behind the portal it seems to disappear, showing only the blackness of space. No ship beyond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Go back in front of it. EXT.-JUPITER TWO As the ship moves back in front of the portal, the hole in space is visible again, the giant probe ship revealed once more within...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a hole in space. A doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A doorway to where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we want to reach that ship, we're going to have to find out. EXT.-SPACE The Jupiter Two flies through the pulsing hole in space. INT.-JUPITER TWO The giant, silver ship looms in the windscreen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No apparent effects on the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hailing on all frequencies. No response.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are some markings on the starboard side. Can you throw some light on her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't know if the exterior spots are working.- There we go. THE WINDSCREEN-CLOSE. Powerful spotlights hit the ship. WEST AND JOHN-CLOSE. And really surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If this in all a dream, why can't there be more girls? THE SPACESHIP-CLOSE. Essentially a needle covered with metal scallops. On its hull, under the legend PROTEUS, an American flag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never seen a design like this. what are those scales on her hull?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How could Earth launch a ship this massive and neither of us know about it? ... It just doesn't make sense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These scanners are damaged, I'm getting inconsistent life signs but they may be sensor ghosts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe her computer's still up. I'm trying standard remote access codes. ON SCREEN-A docking ring on the giant ship comes to life, giant floods coming to life, the docking aperture rotating open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you know? EXT.-SPACE The Jupiter Two heads towards the giant ship. INT.-JUPITER TWO JOHN Can you give me some light on the secondary docking ring? A smaller docking ring is illuminated on the viewscreen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you make of that? Attached to the starboard docking ring is another, smaller craft. Its snaking anthropomorphic lines are not of human design.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boys, I think we're having a close encounter. EXT.-SPACE The Jupiter moves into the docking ring of the giant ship. INT.-JUPITER TWO (OVER) a giant THUD as the Jupiter Two docks with the probe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crush. REVERSE ANGLE. The Robot in rolling in through the doorway, arms waving wildly before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crush! Kill! Destroy! Don and John are up fast. But the Robot just rolls to a stop. Will steps from behind the automaton, his hacker's deck in his hand. He pulls a tiny mic from his deck. Lifts it to his lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crush. Kill. Destroy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crush! Kill! Destroy! Will points to several jury-rigged modifications.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hacked into his CPU, bypassed his main operating system and accessed his sub-routines. He's basically running on remote control. All stare at him. Penny finally speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show off. INT.-JUPITER TWO-CREW QUARTERS-LATER Penny stands guard, a rifle in her hand, talking into her recorder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And so the Space Captive finds herself helping the Robinsons by guarding the traitor. And she finds- Penny's VOICE trails off. Stares out the porthole. Endless space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She finds that out here, in the dark and cold, she's scared, and she's kind of glad they're all together. Just then Don approaches, a silver bundle under his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Identify yourself, soldier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: West, Major, United Space Force, requesting permission to see the prisoner. Penny steps aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Proceed Major West. Don smiles, winks at her, going through the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ouch. Could he be cuter? I don't think so. INT.-SMITH'S CELL Actually a med-lab. Smith turns to face Don an he ENTERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These quarters are totally unacceptable. I demand- Don tosses his bundle on the seat. A silver flight suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going to check out the probe ship. Maybe we can figure out how they got here. And how to get home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ta-ta. Have a wonderful trip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're coming with us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out of the question. I'm a doctor not a space explorer. You and- But Don is in his face in a heartbeat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you are is a murderous saboteur and I am not leaving you on this ship so you can do more harm than you've already caused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I absolutely refuse-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (closer) Give me an excuse to kill you. Please. Smith stares at him a beat. Then he smiles, looks to the flight suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Silver always was my color. INT.-JUPITER TWO-LOWER DECKS Will stands in front of the Robot, polishing a blast mark clean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When boarding a mysterious spacecraft, it always pays to look your best. John enters, removes a gun from the weapons locker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deactivate safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Voiceprint confirmed. Rifle is active. GUN-CLOSE. A small light goes from red to green.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did a good job up there son. You saved us all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. An awkward silence hangs between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know I haven't around much these days.That we haven't had time to-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Professor, we're ready. John looks at his boy Will in silent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will, you're the most important thing in the world to me. I hope one day you'll be able to see that. With that, John walks out. Will stares after him. Faces the Robot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take care of my dad, okay Robot? Will works his remote, sending the Robot towards the bridge. INT.-PROBE SHIP A long dark corridor. Slowly the ambient lights come up. A door opens to reveal Smith, John, Don, Judy and the Robot, stepping out of the docking chamber, the airlock closing in the b.g.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The air is stale. Old.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the smell of ghosts. Don walks to a computer panel set into the wall. Begins typing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm interfacing with the on board computer... Odd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not working?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's just, I don't know, too fast. Most of the systems are down. The Robot rolls deeper into the alien ship. The others follow. More lights flicker into life, illuminating the long corridor ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Motion sensors are still working.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you make of this? Smith, John and Judy join Don at one of the bulkhead walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some kind of hieroglyphics. WALL-CLOSE. A series of hieroglyphics are scrawled on the hull wall. The sketches tell a story. HIEROGLYPH-CLOSE. The alien craft docks with the giant ship. SECOND HIEROGLYPH-CLOSE-A trio of inhuman bipedal stick figures enter the giant ship. THIRD HIEROGLYPH-CLOSE. The shape of a sun or a disc, from which juts many legs. This final hieroglyph is circled in a clotted red substance. Don touches the stain. CHAPTER 13: Exploration -----------------------
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I didn't know better I'd say this is blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know an omen when I see one. I suggest a hasty retreat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just imagine we're retreating in the opposite direction. Now, move it. Don shoves Smith forward with the butt of his laser rifle, the group heading deeper into the quiet ship. INT.-JUPITER TWO Will watches through the Robot's POV, toggling to move the automaton forward. A readout marked AUDIO flashes. Will turns up a volume control. (OVER) the sound of a slow, steady DRIP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, do you.... INT.-PROBE SHIP ROBOT ... Hear something? The Robot turns, begins heading further down the corridor. (OVER) now DRIPPING can be heard by all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like the drip, drip, drip of blood..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really need to shut up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pointing) Here. THE CEILING shows a jagged hole, covered with some kind of viscous membrane, leading to the dark of a service tunnel above. The membrane DRIPS steadily onto the floor below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That material appears biological.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing good will come of this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What makes you such an expert?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me, Major. Evil knows evil.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's find the bridge. Maybe we can get some answers. They head off. HOLD on the dripping membrane. INT.-JUPITER TWO Maureen is at the main sensor console working an instrument panel. Penny is hanging upside down in a harness overhead, using a laser welder on a giant mass of exposed ceiling circuitry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Try it now, Mom. Maureen throws a switch. The panel lights up, then goes dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn. INT.-SHIP-WALKING The boarding party stand at the end of the corridor. Don presses a wall panel. The giant doors hiss open to REVEAL... INT.-MAIN BRIDGE Immense. Empty. And battle torn. Sections of the controls have been blown away. Blast scoring mars the walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell happened in here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some kind of fire fight. Look at this technology. I've seen some of this before. On the drawing boards. Smith has moved off slightly, wandered over to a STORAGE ALCOVE. Within, a row of docked Robots, larger and sleeker then ours. John and Don are powering up the Com, console lights coming on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you bring up the Captain's log?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The data has degraded. I'm going try and gather any fragments I can. There isn't much, but ... here we go. MAIN SCREEN-CLOSE. Fills with snow. Then a figure can be seen. It's Jab. But his hair is grey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jeb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hyperspace tracker seems to be functioning... (static) No sign of the Jupiter Two...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (static) Have exceeded our mission timetable by two... (static) I'm not willing to give up. Don would keep looking for me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it. The rest of the data is totally corrupted. IN THE ALCOVE, Smith frees a power pack from one of the robots. Slips it into the sleeve cuff of his field suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This doesn't make sense. How could they launch a rescue mission for us when we've only been lost a day? Judy stands by the life sciences panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got something here. A turning holograph appears over the console panel. A degraded image of a trembling, viscous pouch. Tiny shapes move within.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They brought it up from the planet's surface. It's seems to be some sort of egg sack. Don notices Smith's standing in the storage alcove.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smith, step away from there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happy to oblige, Major. Although I don't think it's me you should be worrying about. But rather this. In the corner of the ceiling, another membrane covered hole. INT.-JUPITER TWO Will is at his station, watching Don and John via the Robot's POV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm detecting motion. Behind you... INT.-PROBE SHIP BRIDGE A towering SHADOW shoots past the open doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After it. Move. (to the Robot) Bring Smith. INT.-PROBE SHIP-CORRIDOR Don races down the corridor. The walls are matted with flowering plants. Vines twist into a carpet covering the metallic floor. THE SCURRYING SHAPE, about the size of a small dog, shoots out from behind a bulkhead, disappearing into the lush greenery. Don pushes forward through the ever deepening brush until he comes to a door. A plaque reads HYDROPONICS LAB. He races inside. INT.-HYDROPONICS LAB A jungle. John and Judy arrive behind Don.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This explains where all the plants came from.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Growth like this would take decades. The Robot arrives through the lab door, carrying Smith in one claw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unhand me, you mechanical moron. Don's eyes fix behind Smith's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am sick of your terrorism. If you are going to kill me, be done with it. Otherwise I will insist you treat me with the respect and-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (like steel) I said don't move. Smith is suddenly silent. Don's hand shoots out, just missing Smith's head, disappearing into the brush behind him, leaves flying, as-he pulls from its hiding place a small creature. About the size of a large stuffed bear, spiny skin going from leaf color to red, shaped like a rhesus monkey but covered with the scales of a tiny dragon and bright yellow cat's eyes. INT.-JUPITER TWO Will is watching through the Robot's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neat. INT.-PROBE SHIP-HYDROPONICS GARDEN West stares down at the creature in his hand, now a calmer and more friendly blue. Judy approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, who do we have here? As the beast struggles in Don's hand it changes color, chameleon like, trying to hide. No luck. Don holds fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy there, little buddy. No one's going to hurt you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know it won't hurt us? Don has begun stroking the creature's head. After a beat, the small beast begins to COO and emit small BLIPPING sounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like you've made a friend. You have a good bedside manner, Major.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to let that one go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How charming. Doctor Dolittle of outer space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where do you think it came from?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's possible this is one of the creatures represented in the hieroglyphs we saw on the wall. It must have been their ship attached to the other docking ring. The beast has moved onto Don's shoulder, is now clutching there, burying its tiny face into his neck. Don can't help but LAUGH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It looks like a child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If so, my dear Major, what do you suppose happened to its parents?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get back to the bridge. As they leave, a dark shape skitters across the ceiling in the background. Ominous. Unseen. CHAPTER 14: Giant Spiders! -------------------------- INT.-JUPITER TWO Penny is still hanging overhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I've got it. The sensor console comes back to life, displays lighting, status lights going green. Maureen stares at the monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's strange. SCREEN-CLOSE. Revealed in the sensor scan, the scallops pulse with ambient heat. Penny lands beside her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those scales are giving off heat. INT.-PROBE SHIP-BRIDGE John is at the Com.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've tapped into the internal sensor array. Besides us, this ship is totally deserted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A ghost ship. Don is sitting with the tiny creature. He pulls a ration pack from his pocket. Turns it over in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the flavor of the day is ... banana/beef. Who thinks up these combinations? The creature stares at him intently as he tears open the foil lip, sucks a bit LOUDLY. Judy can't help but smile at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Major West, I highly recommend you never breed. That by the way is my medical opinion. Don glares at him, hands the tiny creature the pouch. The creature looks at it, emits a small BLIP, takes a tentative suck. Its eyes widen in delight as it begins to suck the ration pack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little thing was hungry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good Lord, who will - spare us the tyranny of the sentimental? (OVER) a distant, high pitched WHINE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you hear something? Suddenly the creature begins to SCREAM, leaping on Smith's back, clinging to his neck for dear life.
direction.name: direction
